Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: Looking back at last 5 yrs, my govt's singular focus was to bring glory back to Karnataka. We have come a long way from being the most corrupt state in 2010 to become the investment capital of India by 2018.  Yet there is so much more we have to do.  #CongressForNavaKarnataka  https://t.co/vg4ZraDv1v
